messageBody:
Hi David,

We used it for collection the logs for each test for separate file.
In the result directory we have directory for each class (the name of
directory is the name of the class) and this directory log file for each
test and another log for the @BeforeClass and another for the
@... that in the report we can give link to each log file when
you press on the test or the @BeforeClass,@AfterClass
You can see example to that report in the attach image where the link of
info is link to the files created during test like the log file.

BTW - We also extend the expectedException to check not only the class but
also the message of the exception.

Is it possible to add timeout for the @BeforeClass, @AfterClass ?

Thanks
